name: Grate
description:
A student-made game project for Studio 694, WCG's in-house game development team. Created by Garin Thomas and Owen Edwards.

After a small mouse falls into the sewers you the player must help navigate and escape a series of treacherous tunnels in the hope of making it out alive.

Controls

A - Move left

D - move right

F - interact

Space - jump

Follow us at @WCGamesArt

All Studio 694's games are made by students as part of their coursework. We do our best but please expect bugs / glitches / other unexpected strangeness.
